mapper.insert: INSERT INTO notice (noticeno, title, content, cdate, memberno) VALUES (notice_seq.nextval, #{title}, #{content}, SYSDATE, #{memberno})
mapper.select: SELECT noticeno, title, cdate, udate, cnt, importance, visible, memberno, name, r FROM ( SELECT noticeno, title, cdate, udate, cnt, importance, visible, memberno, name, rownum as r FROM ( SELECT n.noticeno, n.title, n.cdate, n.udate, n.cnt, n.importance, n.visible, n.memberno, m.name FROM notice n INNER JOIN member m ON n.memberno = m.memberno WHERE UPPER(n.title) LIKE '%' || UPPER(#{word}) || '%' ) ORDER BY importance ASC, r ASC ) WHERE r >=#{start_num} AND r <=#{end_num}

SELECT count(*) as cnt FROM notice
WHERE (UPPER(title) LIKE '%' || UPPER(#{word}) || '%')
SELECT n.noticeno, n.title, n.content, n.cdate, n.udate, n.cnt, n.importance, n.visible, n.memberno, m.name FROM notice n INNER JOIN member m ON n.memberno = m.memberno WHERE n.noticeno = #{noticeno}
